spatial_accuracy.notes: Overall massing roughly matches (central living/dining, bedrooms distributed left/right), but several plan-to-render mismatches: balcony/deck configuration appears simplified into a more continuous edge rather than two distinct decks (top-left large deck + top-right deck). Service/core area at bottom-left (foyer/HO/toilets) is not clearly preserved; circulation and partitions look rearranged. Multiple door locations/orientations are not verifiable or appear shifted (notably along the bedroom corridor and into bathrooms). Window runs along the top façade look over-continuous vs. segmented openings in plan. Room proportions appear distorted (living/dining and kitchen feel resized; corridor widths and bathroom sizes appear inconsistent with the tight plan).

structural_fidelity.notes: Wall thickness is rendered fairly consistently, but interior partition layout in the foyer/HO/toilet cluster is not faithfully reproduced. Adjacency is partially correct (kitchen near living; bedrooms adjacent to corridor), yet bathroom/utility relationships appear altered. At least one small service room (HO/store-like space) is not clearly represented, and toilet count/placement appears reduced or reconfigured. No obvious extra 'new' major rooms, but balcony geometry and some internal niches appear invented/smoothed compared to the plan.

furniture_mapping.notes: Key furniture types generally match (beds in bedrooms, dining table, living seating), but kitchen is rendered with a large island/peninsula arrangement that does not closely match the plan’s counter geometry. Some furniture scales look generic and may not respect the tight bathroom/utility dimensions shown in 2D.

aesthetic_quality.notes: Clean, visually coherent render with good materials and lighting. Camera is isometric-like but shows mild perspective; not strictly orthographic. Geometry is mostly clean, though balcony/window bands are simplified and reduce plan-readability. Overall clarity is good but fidelity to 2D constraints is weakened by smoothing/merging elements.

detected_errors.description: Deck/balcony layout does not match 2D: two distinct decks (large top-left + smaller top-right) appear merged/simplified in the 3D perimeter.
HO (small room near bottom-center/left in plan) is not clearly present as a distinct enclosed room in the 3D layout.
Bathroom/toilet placements appear reconfigured: the plan’s multiple toilets (TOI-1, C.TOI, TOI-4, small TOI near HO) are not clearly matched one-to-one in the 3D partitions.
Foyer/service-core partitioning at the bottom-left of the plan appears rearranged or simplified, changing circulation paths.
Several door swings/orientations cannot be reconciled with the 2D plan (notably along the bedroom corridor and bathroom entries), suggesting incorrect door orientation/placement.
Window placement along the top façade appears as longer continuous glazing in 3D versus more segmented openings in the 2D plan.
Room proportion distortion: living/dining and kitchen/corridor proportions appear altered relative to the 2D annotated plan, with bathrooms/corridors looking too generous.
Hallucinated/smoothed elements: balcony edge geometry and some interior wall alignments are 'cleaned up' beyond what the 2D plan indicates, creating new continuous edges/niches.
